goals__remit:
The EFBWW is the representative body at European level defending the interests of workers in the Europen construction, wood, furniture and forestry sectors. THe EFBWW has 76 affiliated organisations from 34 countries, representing 2 million workers. 
The EFBWW is a recognised European social partner for the construction, wood and furniture sectors.
relevant_communication:
Project on Asbestos diseases in the Central and Eastern European countries 
Social Partner Project on Asbestos Information Modules 
Planned Social Partner Project on Construction Machines 
Participation in the EESC/CCMI expert group on asbestos 
Initiatives for a strategic combination of energy efficiency in buildings and the safe removal of asbestos 
Publications: Research report on asbestos related diseases in central and eastern European countries; Book-publication: The long and winding road to an asbestos free Europe; Asbestos Information Modules (Social partner action)
